text: Ntibazo	kwemera nagatoyi kubera	wewe	abo	bayahudi	canke	abo bakirisu kugeza aho wewe uzo kurikira imico yabo, na wewe vuga uti:- mu vy’ukuri uburongozi bw’Imana nibwo burongozi nyakuri, rero niwa kurikira muvyo bipfuza	munyuma y’ivyagushikiye kubijanye n’ubumenyi	bw’ukuri, ntuzoronka umufasha uwariwe wese canke uwuzo gukingira ku Mana yawe
